metadata.dc:author: Callejas Pérez, J M
Lisbona Sabater, C
Ruz Sastre, C
metadata.dc:description: Aortic aneurysm and dissection of descending aorta have to be rapidly diagnosed and treated. The treatment frequently includes surgery. The natural history, indications of surgical treatment and surgical technique are reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento quirúrgico de la patología de la aorta descendente. Aneurisma y disección.
[Surgical treatment of the pathology of the descending aorta. Aneurysm and dissection].
